Description_lang: Coats your weapons with a Lethal Poison that lasts for $d. Each strike has a $h% chance to poison the enemy, which instantly inflicts $8680s1 Nature damage and reduces all healing received by $8680s2% for $8680d, stacking up to $8680u times.
AuraDescription_lang: Each strike has a chance of inflicting additional Nature damage to the victim and reducing all healing received for $8680d.

description_blz.en_US: Coats your weapons with a Lethal Poison that lasts for 1 hour. Each strike has a 30% chance to poison the enemy, which instantly inflicts 22 Nature damage and reduces all healing received by 8% for 12 sec, stacking up to 3 times.
description_blz.es_MX: Cubre tus armas con un veneno letal que dura 1 h. Cada golpe tiene un 30% de probabilidad de envenenar al enemigo, lo que inflige 22 p. de daño de naturaleza al instante y reduce todas las sanaciones recibidas un 8% durante 12 s. Este efecto se acumula hasta 3 veces.
description_blz.pt_BR: Cobre a arma com um Veneno Letal que dura 1 hora. Cada acerto tem 30% de chance de envenenar o inimigo, causando instantaneamente 21 de dano de Natureza e reduzindo em 8% toda a cura recebida por 12 s. Acumula até 3 vezes.
description_blz.de_DE: Überzieht Eure Waffen mit einem tödlichen Gift, das 1 Stunde lang an ihnen haften bleibt. Bei jedem Angriff besteht eine Chance von 30%, den Gegner zu vergiften, was sofort 21 Naturschaden verursacht und 12 Sek. lang sämtliche erhaltene Heilung um 8% verringert. Dieser Effekt ist bis zu 3-mal stapelbar.
description_blz.en_GB: Coats your weapons with a Lethal Poison that lasts for 1 hour. Each strike has a 30% chance to poison the enemy, which instantly inflicts 21 Nature damage and reduces all healing received by 8% for 12 sec, stacking up to 3 times.
description_blz.es_ES: Cubre tus armas con un veneno letal que dura 1 h. Cada golpe tiene un 30% de probabilidad de envenenar al enemigo, lo que inflige al instante 21 p. de daño de Naturaleza y reduce un 8% toda la sanación recibida durante 12 s. Se acumula 3 veces.
description_blz.fr_FR: Vous enduisez vos armes d’un poison létal qui dure 1 heure. Chaque coup porté a 30% de chances d’empoisonner l’ennemi, ce qui lui inflige instantanément 21 points de dégâts de Nature et réduit de 8% les soins qu’il reçoit pendant 12 s, cumulable jusqu’à 3 fois.
description_blz.it_IT: Impregna le tue armi con un veleno letale che dura 1 ora. Ogni colpo ha una probabilità del 30% di avvelenare il nemico, infliggendo istantaneamente 21 danni da natura e riducendone tutte le cure ricevute del 8% per 12 s. Si accumula fino a 3 volte.
description_blz.ru_RU: Покрывает оружие смертельным ядом, действующим 1 ч. Каждый удар с вероятностью 30% отравляет противника, мгновенно нанося 21 ед. урона от сил природы и на 12 сек. ослабляя получаемое исцеление на 8%. Суммируется до 3 раз.
description_blz.ko_KR: 무기에 1시간 동안 유지되는 치명독을 바릅니다. 매 공격 시 30%의 확률로 적을 중독시켜 순간적으로 22의 자연 피해를 입히고 12초 동안 대상이 받는 모든 치유 효과를 8%만큼 감소시킵니다. 최대 3번까지 중첩됩니다.
description_blz.zh_TW: 在你的武器上塗抹猛烈毒藥，持續1小時。每次攻擊都有30%的機率使敵人中毒，立即造成22點自然傷害，並使其受到的治療效果降低8%，持續12秒，最多可堆疊3次。
description_blz.zh_CN: 使用致命药膏给你的武器浸毒，效果持续1小时。每次攻击都有30%的几率令敌人中毒，立即造成21点自然伤害，并使其受到的所有治疗效果降低8%，持续12秒，最多可叠加3次。
